name: thrush
content:
thrush noun
(BIRD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] (also song thrush) a brown bird with a pale breast with spots on it that is known for its singing
cimbat/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

thrush noun
(INFECTION)
[ U ] mainly UK an infection of the vagina or mouth
